00009 //         You can change it by calling SetVerbose(int) somewhere
00010 //         or modifying input card before starting a run.
00011 //         Either way would set verbose of selected sensitive detectors to the same level
00012 //         0:    Only Warnings and Errors
00013 //         1:    Important information
00014 //         >= 5: All information
